text: The 2016 The Summit League men's soccer season was the 11th season of men's varsity soccer in the conference. The Denver Pioneers are both the defending regular season and conference tournament champions. == Changes from 2015 == * None == Teams == === Stadiums and locations === {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align: left;" !
